response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which is valued at $15,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $14,500. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a discounted rate. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange the details promptly. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
